document_data.title: The Tower of Ahghairon
document_data.design: [[Jocelyn Koehler]]{{Cite adventurers league/The Tower of Ahghairon|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Tower of Ahghairon''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Waterdeep|Waterdeep]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Undermountain]], and is an adventure designed for 17{{th}}- to 20{{th}}-level characters. It is part two of the ''Home Sweet Home'' Trilogy.

{{Quote|''The Tower of Ahghairon has been sealed for years, but when the door opens at last, it’s an invitation to even more mystery within.''|}}
